alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 6:32PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Pasco, Pinellas and northwestern Hillsborough Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 632 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Beacon Square to near Clearwater to near Tierra Verde. Movement was west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, pea size hail, and funnel clouds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Largo, Pinellas Park, Seminole, New Port Richey, Downtown Saint Petersburg, Saint Petersburg, Lutz, Fort Desoto Park, Holiday, Hudson, St. Petersburg, St. Pete Beach, Palm Harbor, South Highpoint, New Port Richey East, Tierra Verde, Tampa International Airport and Egypt Lake-Leto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
